4317.verse: وَتَرَٮٰهُمْ|And you will see them|165|179|7098$يُعْرَضُونَ|being exposed|115|144|8421$عَلَيْهَا|to it,|72|101|1269$خَـٰشِعِينَ|humbled|99|128|3653$مِنَ|by|50|79|156$ٱلذُّلِّ|disgrace,|80|94|10310$يَنظُرُونَ|looking|102|114|1830$مِن|with|50|74|53$طَرْفٍ|a glance|80|104|15419$خَفِىٍّ‌ۗ|stealthy.|79|103|15420$وَقَالَ|And will say|98|122|1089$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|113|20$ءَامَنُوٓاْ|believed,|82|94|84$إِنَّ|`Indeed,|78|87|58$ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ|the losers|116|133|639$ٱلَّذِينَ|(are) those who|127|144|20$خَسِرُوٓاْ|lost|91|108|5453$أَنفُسَهُمْ|themselves|94|111|87$وَأَهْلِيهِمْ|and their families|132|141|14942$يَوْمَ|(on the) Day|105|112|1057$ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ‌ۗ|(of) the Resurrection.|164|178|820$أَلَآ|Unquestionably!|125|139|105$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|84|58$ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|the wrongdoers|123|137|377$فِى|(are) in|69|76|89$عَذَابٍ|a punishment|108|358|7871$مُّقِيمٍ|lasting.|68|318|9826$

4318.verse: وَمَا|And not|72|83|46$كَانَ|will be|61|82|913$لَهُم|for them|76|98|98$مِّنْ|any|50|72|53$أَوْلِيَآءَ|protector|82|104|2754$يَنصُرُونَهُم|(who) will help them|154|176|15421$مِّن دُونِ|besides|101|112|224$ٱللَّهِ‌ۗ|Allah.|56|66|2$وَمَن|And whom|88|108|1012$يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ|Allah lets go astray|148|168|4277$فَمَا|then not|77|97|132$لَهُۥ|for him|65|85|977$مِن|any|50|70|53$سَبِيلٍ|way.|69|79|4020$

4320.verse: فَإِنْ|Then if|66|76|227$أَعْرَضُواْ|they turn away,|127|147|13480$فَمَآ|then not|77|97|132$أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ|We have sent you|141|161|1101$عَلَيْهِمْ|over them|87|107|22$حَفِيظًا‌ۖ|(as) a guardian.|126|136|4230$إِنْ|Not|44|52|225$عَلَيْكَ|(is) on you|92|108|2245$إِلَّا|except|65|81|86$ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ‌ۗ|the conveyance.|132|148|2713$وَإِنَّآ|And indeed,|98|114|682$إِذَآ|when|55|71|1370$أَذَقْنَا|We cause to taste|144|152|15425$ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ|[the] man|90|99|8037$مِنَّا|from Us|70|87|1169$رَحْمَةً|Mercy,|78|95|2636$فَرِحَ|he rejoices|92|109|7783$بِهَا‌ۖ|in it.|50|67|1203$وَإِن|But if|58|75|213$تُصِبْهُمْ|befalls them|100|117|4218$سَيِّئَةُۢ|evil,|65|74|3221$بِمَا|for what|76|83|43$قَدَّمَتْ|have sent forth|123|137|897$أَيْدِيهِمْ|their hands|94|108|757$فَإِنَّ|then indeed,|103|117|599$ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ|[the] man|90|104|8037$كَفُورٌ|(is) ungrateful.|119|126|8387$

4321.verse: لِّلَّهِ|To Allah|73|82|924$مُلْكُ|(belongs the) dominion|171|189|1005$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|(of) the heavens|132|150|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۚ|and the earth.|116|134|352$يَخْلُقُ|He creates|92|110|2875$مَا|what|53|62|262$يَشَآءُ‌ۚ|He wills.|74|80|867$يَهَبُ|He grants|84|96|15426$لِمَن|to whom|77|89|1356$يَشَآءُ|He wills|69|81|867$إِنَـٰثًا|females,|75|87|4464$وَيَهَبُ|and He grants|113|125|15427$لِمَن|to whom|77|89|1356$يَشَآءُ|He wills|69|75|867$ٱلذُّكُورَ|[the] males.|101|101|15428$

4317.verse: And you will see them being exposed to the Fire, humbled from humiliation, looking from [behind] a covert glance. And those who had believed will say, "Indeed, the [true] losers are the ones who lost themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection. Unquestionably, the wrongdoers are in an enduring punishment."

4318.verse: And there will not be for them any allies to aid them other than Allah. And whoever Allah sends astray - for him there is no way.

4319.verse: Respond to your Lord before a Day comes from Allah of which there is no repelling. No refuge will you have that day, nor for you will there be any denial.

4320.verse: But if they turn away - then We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], over them as a guardian; upon you is only [the duty of] notification. And indeed, when We let man taste mercy from us, he rejoices in it; but if evil afflicts him for what his hands have put forth, then indeed, man is ungrateful.

4321.verse: To Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth; He creates what he wills. He gives to whom He wills female [children], and He gives to whom He wills males.

4322.verse: Or He makes them [both] males and females, and He renders whom He wills barren. Indeed, He is Knowing and Competent.

4323.verse: And it is not for any human being that Allah should speak to him except by revelation or from behind a partition or that He sends a messenger to reveal, by His permission, what He wills. Indeed, He is Most High and Wise.
